name: SARSCoronavirus2PCRQualitativeAndQuantitative
title: SARS Coronavirus 2 PCR, Qualitative and Quantitative
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to quantitative and qualitative detection of nucleic acids within the multiple genes of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens (serum, plasma, respiratory, or unspecified).),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of nucleic acids within the multiple genes of SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens (serum, plasma, respiratory, or unspecified).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes panels.)
